text: Rob E. Kass is an American statistician. He is currently the Maurice Falk Professor of Statistics & Computational Neuroscience at Carnegie Mellon University. Kass was elected as a Fellow of the American Statistical Association in 1990. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Carnegie Mellon University faculty Category:American statisticians Category:University of Chicago alumni Category:Fellows of the American Statistical Association
title: Rob Kass
